room_title: Escape room "The Experiment" by Mental Trap in Portland
room_description:
Escape room moving.
You and your team of scientists have become part of a twisted game of survival and deception.  A demented colleague has taken some of your staff and locked them within a hidden passage of his secret laboratory so they can become subjects of his medical experiments.
In an attempt to save your friends, you unwilling started a chain reaction, reviving a hideous monster. Now it is up to you to outwit this laboratory of traps, and stop this reanimated creature, and get out with your livesâ€¦
